name: Lawn Mowing
description: Professional lawn mowing tailored to your yard's needs. We adjust cutting height by season and grass type to promote healthy, lush growth. Includes clipping cleanup and stripe finishing for a pristine look.

name: Edging & Trimming
description: Crisp, clean edges along driveways, sidewalks, and flower beds that frame your lawn beautifully. Our precision trimming reaches every spot mowers can't, giving your yard a polished, manicured appearance.

name: Leaf Removal
description: Thorough leaf removal to keep your lawn healthy and your property looking its best. We use professional-grade blowers and vacuums to clear every leaf, preventing mold and turf damage.

name: Spring Cleanup
description: Comprehensive spring preparation to kickstart your lawn's growing season. Includes debris removal, thatch raking, bed edging, and an initial mow to set the foundation for a beautiful summer yard.

name: Fall Cleanup
description: Get your yard winter-ready with our complete fall cleanup service. We handle leaf removal, final mowing, bed preparation, and gutter clearing so your property stays protected through the cold months.

name: Fertilization Treatment
description: Custom fertilization programs designed for Lawrence's soil and climate conditions. We apply the right nutrients at the right time to promote deep root growth, vibrant color, and long-term lawn health.
